Shapes.description: Common elements to create simple design Ext JS Neptune
Shapes.author: Pencil Team

PropertyGroup.name: Text
PropertyGroup.Property: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Action.Impl: var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("AddingBottom", b.y + b.height, "Top", false, this.id), new SnappingData("AddingRight", b.x + b.width - 8, "Right", true, this.id), new SnappingData("AddingLeft", b.x + 8, "Left", true, this.id)]

PropertyGroup.name: Text
PropertyGroup.Property: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

For.D: [ M(0, 0), L(10, 0), M(16 + F.textSize("header").w, 0), L($box.w, 0), L($box.w, $box.h), L(0, $box.h), L(0, 0) ] //depends $text, $textFont

if($type.value == "first") [M(0,0), L($box.w, 0), L($box.w, $box.h), L(0, $box.h)] else if($type.value == "center") [M(0,0), L($box.w, 0), L($box.w, $box.h), L(0, $box.h), z] else if($type.value == "last") [M($box.w, 0), L(0, 0), L(0, $box.h), L($box.w, $box.h)] else [M(0,0), L($box.w, 0), M($box.w, $box.h), L(0, $box.h)]

Action.Impl: var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("AdddingRight", b.x + b.width, "Left", true, this.id), new SnappingData("AddingLeft", b.x, "Right", true, this.id), new SnappingData("CellSnapping", b.y + b.height + 1, "CellSnapping", false, this.id), new SnappingData("BottomToTop", b.y + b.height, "Top", false, this.id)]
var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("CellSnapping", b.y, "CellSnapping", false, this.id), new SnappingData("BottomToTop", b.y + b.height + 1, "Top", false, this.id)]

var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("AddingLeft", b.x + 20, "Left", true, this.id), new SnappingData("ChildSnapping", b.x + 40, "ChildSnapping", true, this.id), new SnappingData("BottomToTop", b.y + b.height, "Top", false, this.id), new SnappingData("TopToBottom", b.y, "Bottom", false, this.id)]

var thiz = this; thiz.setProperty("image", new ImageData(16, 24,"data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABAAAAAYCAYAAADzoH0MAAAABHNCSVQICAgIfAhkiAAAAG9JREFUOI3t0UEKgCAQheFeN3SuEi3CIAiDCOoo4xFfi3QTCurafyUo3ww4DD3Eg/eeuUckJxF5Undj0RTgVtW5GSC5A7hU1TYBIrKRPAC4P1IEBGQleQbEVQMBWQJiI1L0C7mMMajaIFUHOtD7egFjzC3Oy9qAQwAAAABJRU5ErkJggg=="));

var b = this.getBounding(); return [ new SnappingData("BottomToTop", b.y + b.height, "Top", false, this.id), new SnappingData("TopToBottom", b.y, "Bottom", false, this.id), new SnappingData("ChildSnapping", b.x, "ChildSnapping", true, this.id),]
